mapper.select: select a.*, b.alter_file_name as title_file_name from gs_product a left join gs_image_file b on a.product_img_file_seq = b.seq where a.delete_yn = 'N' and a.is_best = 1 order by a.seq desc limit 4
select a.*, b.alter_file_name as title_file_name from gs_product a left join gs_image_file b on a.product_img_file_seq = b.seq where a.delete_yn = 'N' and a.is_new = 1 order by a.seq desc limit 4

select a.*, b.alter_file_name as title_file_name, c.category_title as category_title from gs_product a left join gs_image_file b on a.product_img_file_seq = b.seq join ( select * from gs_product_category where seq = #{categorySeq} and delete_yn = 'N' ) c on a.category_seq = c.seq where a.delete_yn = 'N'
